column2: From 1815 to 1821 Napoleon had a lot of time to sit right there & think about what he'd done on this island 1,200 mi. off Africa
column4: Ponce de Leon took a very early Florida vacation in 1513 & claimed land for Spain near what is now this city
column6: The name of this largest of the U.S. Virgin Islands means "holy cross" & holy cross! The average temp there is 82!
column8: This river flows into the gulf of the same name, northeast out of Lake Ontario
column10: The 3,792-foot peak that forms much of this, Nevis' pal, is the pleasantly named Mount Misery
